author: vlimant
body:
#### PR description:

while going through https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/pull/1872 we discussed the painful long workflow names and subsequent long directory names.
this PR uses the mostly unused feature of defining a nickname for a workflow using the first string
`wf[num] = ['anickname', ['step1name', ...] ]`

the visual of `--show` and the `runall-report-step123-.log` are mostly unchanged

- [x] the PR will be complete with pulling some of the naming maintained in https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/blob/master/comparisons/matrix_RE.txt 

but I'd like to check on opinions about this, and the interaction with cms-bot

#### PR validation:

configuring a couple of workflows with `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -j 0` went smoothly.
title: short names for matrix workflows
